# amrl_shared_lib
Shared library for all AMRL C++ projects

## Build
1. Install dependencies:
   ```
   sudo apt-get install libgoogle-glog-dev cmake build-essential
   ```
1. Compile
   ```
   make -j`nproc`
   ```
